name: High Country 4x4 & Offroad
summary: 4x4 and suspension specialists. Lifts, axle rebuilds, and Cherokee-specific work. Call ahead for Cherokee appointments.

name: Cherokee Country Repair
summary: General Cherokee and Jeep repair. Known for accurate diagnostics on the 4.0L. Locally owned.

name: South TX Offroad Works
summary: Lifts, axle swaps, and driveline work on XJs and ZJs. Shop rate competitive. Work backs up fast so book early.

name: Pacific Trail Garage
summary: Full-service shop with a focus on older 4x4s. Familiar with XJ quirks. Honest diagnostics before any work starts.

name: Blue Ridge Jeep & 4x4
summary: XJ and ZJ specialists. Full general repair plus overheating and cooling system fixes. Reasonable rates.

name: Coastal Cherokee Clinic
summary: Good general shop that handles Cherokee electrical issues well. Clean work and fair pricing.

name: Sun State Cherokee Shop
summary: Cooling system and electrical specialists. Familiar with the overheating problems common on Florida-heat Cherokees.

name: Desert Iron 4x4
summary: Lift installs, axle work, and general XJ repairs. Owner has run Cherokees for 20+ years.

name: Peach State Jeep Works
summary: Honest general shop that handles Cherokee driveline and diagnostics. Long wait times but solid work.

name: Appalachian Offroad & Repair
summary: Full 4x4 repair shop with Cherokee experience. Lift installs, steering, and general service.

name: Northern Cal Cherokee Works
summary: General repair with solid electrical troubleshooting. Has Cherokee-specific diagnostic experience.

name: Rocky Mountain Salvage
summary: Large inventory of XJ and ZJ parts. Call ahead to check Cherokee availability before making the trip.

name: Southern Pull-A-Part
summary: Self-service yard with rotating Cherokee inventory. Bring your own tools. Low prices on pulled parts.

name: Texas Auto Recyclers
summary: Full-service salvage with a large inventory. Cherokee parts available. Shipping options on major components.

name: Pacific Northwest Jeep Salvage
summary: XJ and ZJ specialist salvage. Good rust-free inventory due to dry storage. Call before visiting.

name: Volunteer State Auto Parts
summary: Pull-a-part and full-service options. Regular Cherokee turnover. Check inventory online before the drive.

name: Desert Southwest Salvage
summary: Dry climate means rust-free parts. Strong Cherokee XJ inventory. Open most weekends.

name: Cherokee Parts Direct
summary: Online and local Cherokee-specific parts supplier. New and used XJ components. Ships nationwide.

name: Four Wheel Drive Hardware
summary: Mail-order and online parts retailer specializing in Jeep parts including XJ and ZJ components.
